sections.heading: to or guaranties for directors and officers
sections.text: (a) A corporation may not lend money to or guaranty the obligation of a director or officer of the corporation.(b) The fact that a loan or guaranty is made in violation of this section does not affect the borrower's liability on the loan.SourceLaws 1996, L

21-1988.Loans to or guaranties for directors and officers.

(a) A corporation may not lend money to or guaranty the obligation of a director or officer of the corporation.

(b) The fact that a loan or guaranty is made in violation of this section does not affect the borrower's liability on the loan.

SourceLaws 1996, LB 681, ยง 88.
